citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:49pm on
12-Mar-18.
Telephone contact was made with the licensee. She was away and unable to return for several hours. No other
responsible adult was available to conduct the inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:49pm on
12-Mar-18.
Telephone contact was made with the licensee.  She was away and unable to return for several hours.  No other
responsible adult was available to conduct the inspection.
